process-services.title: Discovery, analysis and planning
process-services.description: Creation of a detailed plan including the full features and integrations list, user stories and key deliverables and project timeline.

process-services.title: Visual design & Prototyping
process-services.description: A 2-phase process starting with the design of core pages (home, product & category) to achieve the perfect look and feel, along with optimized UI/UX, which are then rolled out to all other pages.

process-services.title: On-going communication
process-services.description: Regular standup meetings between our teams to streamline communication and ensure seamless delivery of each task.

process-services.title: Store development
process-services.description: Your store takes its final shape as we develop the production versions of all pages, carefully import your products and customers and perform all necessary integrations, all while your dedicated project manager keeps everything on track and on schedule.

process-services.title: Quality assurance
process-services.description: We take a 360-degree view of your project and rigorously test all aspects of your site, from layout to security, and integrations to animations. No aspect of the site is too small for our detailed review.

process-services.title: User acceptance testing
process-services.description: Your project manager will walk you through the project from end-to-end, demonstrating the breadth of your new store, and request approval from your team that everything is good to go.

process-services.title: Release
process-services.description: Hurray - your new store is in business! We maintain focus on your store after going live to ensure launch is seamless. We are happy to offer post-release support to your team on an on-going basis.
